title: Itâ€™s alright
review: The game is a fun recreation of the Lego ninjago movie which I enjoyed. However there are some things that I think way it down. Mainly the fact that there are no real levels which means they are set in the hub which is a new idea but it doesn’t work as it make the hub quite liner and enclosed. However I respect the attempt to make the game unique but I would recommend dc super villains or marvel superheroes 2 over this
